= Introduction =

Find invoke method in class/jar files.


= Usage =

 # Install
  * Check out
   svn co http://hatter-source-code.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/invokefind/
  * Compile & Install
   ant install
  * Download invokefind.jar and run is also ok.
{{{
   wget http://hatter-source-code.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/invokefind/invokefind.jar
   java -jar invokefind.jar
}}}
 # Usage
{{{
Usage:
  invokefind [flags] <args>
  java -jar invokefind [flags] <args>
  java -cp invokefind.jar invokefind [flags] <args>
    -t <dir>       target dir[default user.dir]
    -o <file>      output file
    -ig <str>      ignore[contains]
    -igc <str>     ignore class[contains]
    -igm <str>     ignore method[equals]
    --vf           print visit file
    --vc           print visit class
    --vm           print visit method
    --vs           print summary
    --noins        print no instructions methods
Sample:
  invokefind --vc "xstream.<init>" string.intern
}}}
 # Outputs
{{{
[INFO] Match found: [com/alibaba/dubbo/rpc/http/form/codec/XmlCodec.<init>()V]:  INVOKESPECIAL com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream.<init> (Lcom/thoughtworks/xstream/io/HierarchicalStreamDriver;)V
}}}
